mutants.original_line: x_values = np.arange(0, 10, 0.5)
mutants.mutated_line: x_values = np.arange(1, 10, 0.5)
mutants.code:
import numpy as np

def generate_sorted_array(f):
    x_values = np.arange(1, 10, 0.5)
    filtered_values = [f(x) for x in x_values if x % 3 == 0 and f(x) > 0]
    sorted_values = np.sort(filtered_values)[::-1]
    return sorted_values
